trans-unit.source: Resources and resource groups can be tagged with a set of name-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Resources and resource groups can be tagged with a set of name-value pairs.

trans-unit.source: Adding tags to resources enables you to group resources together across resource groups and to create your own views.
trans-unit.target: Adding tags to resources enables you to group resources together across resource groups and to create your own views.

trans-unit.source: Each resource or resource group can have a maximum of 15 tags.
trans-unit.target: Each resource or resource group can have a maximum of 15 tags.

trans-unit.source: The following information is common to all tasks that you might complete related to tags:
trans-unit.target: The following information is common to all tasks that you might complete related to tags:

trans-unit.source: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.
trans-unit.target: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.

trans-unit.source: Set the <parameterReference>Content-Type</parameterReference> header for all requests to <embeddedLabel>application/json</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Set the <parameterReference>Content-Type</parameterReference> header for all requests to <embeddedLabel>application/json</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Set the <parameterReference>Authorization</parameterReference> header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Set the <parameterReference>Authorization</parameterReference> header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: You can do the following with tags:
trans-unit.target: You can do the following with tags:
